content: Victor Edward: yes, I caught some echoes of Dr. Gonzo in that epic rant too. But please, HST, the Godfather and inventor of Gonzo Journalism, was my favorite writer of the entire 20th Century. He was talented enough to not need to make every other damn word an F-bomb. Overuse of that word renders it impotent and meaningless. The lurid descriptions by Belknap of his violent fantasies without a zillion effins would have shown more creativity.
